transport.question: I have wheels and take you places, but I'm smaller than a car. What am I?

hints.text: 👧👦 Sometimes more than one person can ride me.
🏡 I am often found in your garden

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people or things. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I don't fly in the air.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚳 You can fall off if you don't balance.
⚙️ I have pedals and a chain.
⛑️ You should wear a helmet when riding me.

transport.question: I have many seats and take lots of people to school or around town. What am I?
I travel on tracks and carry many people from city to city. What am I?

hints.text: 📢 You can hear me coming from far away.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: 💺 I have lots of seats inside.

transport.question: I'm a car that you can hire to take you where you want to go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I often wait near train stations or airports.
💰 You have to pay to ride in me.
🚦 I have a meter to calculate the cost.

transport.question: I am very fast, and I am used for emergencies, with a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I take people to the hospital quickly.
👨‍⚕️ I am there to help save you.

transport.question: I carry cargo across the ocean, and I'm much bigger than a regular boat. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I'm used for importing and exporting.
🌍 I can visit lots of countries.

transport.question: I am fast and powerful, and I can take people or things to space! What am I?

bug.question: I have six legs and like to buzz. I make honey for you, because! What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I have black and yellow stripes.

bug.question: I can jump very high, and I'm usually green. You might see me in a grassy scene! What am I?
I have bright spots and fly around. Gardeners are happy when I'm around! What am I?
I crawl on the ground and work with my friends. We carry food to our home that never ends! What are we?

hints.text: 🐜 We are very small and strong.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then wrap myself tight. I emerge with wings and take to the sky in flight! What am I?
I glow in the dark, a tiny bright spark. I fly around at night, a magical light! What am I?
I make a sticky web to catch my prey. I have eight legs, what am I, hey hey?
I hum and zip all around. I have two sets of wings and eat small insects that surround. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I can be found near water.
👀 My eyes take up most of my head
🐉 I am a symbol of courage and strength

bug.question: I blend in with leaves, so hard to be found. I wait very still until prey is around! What am I?
I march in long lines, with purpose so clear. I can destroy a whole field, filled with plants we hold dear! What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 My home is usually in warmer climates.
🐜 I am a type of ant.
